alert.note: Alert for Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 1:59PM MST until January 08 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation then snow showers are expected through tonight. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Missoula/Bitterroot Valleys. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 2 PM MST this afternoon. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 2 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Black ice is a large concern tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
